events.message: We have received an application from Jane Doe for the Software Engineer position, showing strong experience in backend development.
The application was reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster, focusing on backend and DevOps expertise.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to handle Jane Doeâ€™s candidacy for the Software Engineer role.
Initial phone screening went well; candidate demonstrated solid knowledge in software development and problem-solving skills.
Jane Doe responded promptly and enthusiastically to schedule a technical interview next week.
A technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th with the lead software engineer to evaluate coding skills.
